amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds by BATF to classify 7N6 (5.45 x 39) ammunition as "armor piercing" for purposes of import.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to carry out the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms, and Explosive Special Advisory entitled "Test, Examination and Classification of 7N6 5.45x39 Ammunition", dated April 7, 2014.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A075) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A075) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A075) offered by Mr. Gosar.
